titleStmt.title: A friendly debate on a weighty subject: or, a conference by writing betwixt Mr Samuel Eaton and Mr John Knowles concerning the divinity of Iesus Christ: for the beating out, and further clearing up of truth.
titleStmt.author: Eaton, Samuel, 1596?-1665.
Knowles, John, fl. 1646-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Gyles Calvert, at the black spread-Eagle at the West-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
